overview: To be or not to be a mother, that is the question. Milagros (37) stretches a carefree youth in her last years of fertility while Jonathan (24), seeks solace in Grindr in order to overcome abandonment issues.Friendship and driving ease the disorientation caused by the deceptive freedom of the early 21st century.A delirious Road Movie full of music, where a mysterious mermaid with a magic crown will set the course of the journey.
tagline: Milagros stretches a carefree youth in her last years of fertility while Jonathan seeks solace in Grindr to overcome abandonment issues. A delirious road movie, full of music, where a mysterious mermaid will set the course of the journey.
title: On the Go
